name: EmotiWorld AGA V1.1
description:
**************

Marcelo the Emoji needs to collect hearts from the Dark Cavern , where the Bad Dudes lives and Bring More Amiga Love to his lives...

Minimun Requirements : Amiga 1200 stock 

Coded in Amos Professional Unity.

Pure Amal (Amos sub-language at assembler speed ) for enemies. 

128 Colours in AGA lowres mode  plus 16 colours in copper background.

Intro Loading Screen ham8 262.000+  colours made in Photoshop 

and then convert in PPaint...

Custom Map Level Design Tools Routines.

Version 1.1

-Sound Fixes! Big improvement on Mod playing & SFX

-Minor Details Fixes.

-Score counter Fixes.

e-mail

Thanks for playing Emotiworld AGA

See you in our next Game!
